title: Can we make a petition to bring back Cass' old splash?
body:
Like literally her old splash art/portrait was so mystic/mysterious and beautiful, I loved it so much when I would pick her in champ select when she was never played and when they saw her face get locked in nobody knew what to expect because they practically forgot about her

I find her current one (moreso the portrait/small square form that u see in champion select/ingame) to be HIDEOUS, like at least make her look pretty if ur gonna gonna make her much more boring to play (really, the old cass was such a thrill to play as - now all i look to do is jam my e key) 

like i miss destroying people with poisons from a mile away (rip burn build) and choosing between poking/winding them down before going in for the twin fang spam instead of just all out mashing my E button but yea now this has turned into a cass balance rant as opposed to just talking about how amazing her older splash was 

thanks love you all nerf miss fortune
